participant_1.background:
I love spending time with my family, especially taking my son to the zoo to see koalas.
i love watching funny movies.
my two dogs are the best friends a girl could have.
I'm grateful for my health and the ability to work on my farm.
I filmed a documentary about a group of people who were following their dreams and it was an amazing experience.

participant_2.background:
I'm afraid of not being able to beat my competitors in the marathon.
my favorite color is pruple.
I spend a lot of time exercising and eating healthy foods to maintain my toned body.
I won't fight, but I've had to defend myself on more than one occasion.
My most valued material possession is my collection of children's books.

content.text: Hello there, what do you enjoy doing in your free time?
I spend a lot of time exercising and eating healthy foods to maintain my toned body. I also like to read children's books. What about you?
I love spending time with my family, especially taking my son to the zoo to see koalas. I also love watching funny movies.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love animals, so I can imagine that the zoo would be a great place to take your son. I've never seen a koala in real life, but they look so cute.
They really are! They're also very cuddly, which my son loves.
That's so cute! I'm glad you have such a great time with your son.
That's wonderful! I'm sure he's very lucky to have you as his mom.
It sounds like you're doing a great job
